pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, October 24, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, October 24, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Fall Economic Statement update speech, to be delivered by the Minister of Finance in the House of Commons.
